hadiths.text: It was narrated from Yahya bin Sa 'eed , who said:"Nafi narrated to us from Ibn 'Umar, who said: 'The Messenger of Allah said: There is no transaction between the two parties until they separate, unless they have chosen to conclude the transaction."" (Sahih)

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ الاِخْتِلاَفِ عَلَى نَافِعٍ فِي لَفْظِ حَدِيثِهِ
chapter.eng-name: Mentioning the Differneces Reported From Nafi
